Name: Faint
Description: An aura's power depends on a spell's functioning spell level or an item's caster level. If an aura falls into more than one category, detect magic indicates the stronger of the two, as described in Detect Magic spell.

Name: Moderate
Description: An aura's power depends on a spell's functioning spell level or an item's caster level. If an aura falls into more than one category, detect magic indicates the stronger of the two, as described in Detect Magic spell.
